titleStmt.title: A letter to His Excellency the Lord General Monk containing the instrumental causes of the ruine of governments and Common-wealths, with as advertisement of our present danger by a forrein invasion.
titleStmt.author: Maudit, John.
Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
